statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerType , AA.CustomerName , AA.EngName , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMCustomer AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBAS.dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'CustomerType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.CustomerName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EngName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerType , AA.CustomerName , AA.EngName , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
FROM dbo.BMCustomer AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMCustomer ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerType, CustomerName, EngName, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerType#, #CustomerName#, #EngName#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMCustomer SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerType = #CustomerType# , CustomerName = #CustomerName# , EngName = #EngName# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description#
WHERE ID = #ID#
